text:
Jordin Sparks is happier than she’s ever been! Although the star’s life has been filled with different milestones, perhaps the most notable is the birth of her baby boy DJ Isaiah.

Ever since she won American Idol at the age of just 17, Jordin’s career has taken off.

But after years of nonstop working, becoming a mom and taking a break may be what she needed.

Sparks now has a very beautiful and happy family alongside her son and husband Dana Isaiah, and she always makes sure to share some of the most memorable moments of her life with her many fans as well.

The two were introduced by some mutual friends, and the connection was immediate.

After her failed relationships with Jason Derulo and then Sage the Gemini, she had pretty much given up on love.

‘I had gone through a crazy time last year, so I was just like ‘You know that? I’m good. I am going to stay single. I am just not going to look.’ It is amazing that that phrase, ‘When you don’t look for it, that’s when it comes,’’ she shared with People.

The in love pair eloped in July of 2017 in Hawaii, and just weeks after their wedding, they learned that they were pregnant!

On Father’s Day, Sparks paid tribute to her man, and it was very sweet: ‘I knew the moment that I met you that my life was going to change. And it really has in the most beautiful way. Thank you for being the most amazing man I know. For bringing me much light and joy. For making me a Mommy. For constantly building me up and making me better. For loving me and loving DJ.’

The singer is definitely enjoying motherhood, and she was ready for it even before the birth: ‘The joy, laughter, scrapes, and bruises…I can’t wait for it all!’

However, when it comes to giving her son a sibling, let’s just say it’s not going to happen anytime soon.

Advertisement

‘No, no. I’m not ready. Nope. I would love for him to grow [up with siblings] because we had siblings. But ask me in like three years,’ she previously told ET.
title: All About Jordin Sparks’ Happy Life As A Mom And Wife To The ‘Most Amazing’ Husband
